mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT space_num, users_num, space_name, mainImagePath, addr, seller_space.cate_name cate_name, oneliner FROM seller_space INNER JOIN space_category ON seller_space.cate_name=space_category.cate_name) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum} ORDER BY rnum ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, rownum FROM (SELECT space_num, space_name, mainimagepath, addr, cate_name, cate_num, review.review_content FROM (SELECT * FROM seller_space INNER JOIN space_category ON seller_space.cate_name=space_category.cate_name) INNER JOIN review ON space_num=review.space_num ORDER BY review.review_num DESC)result1) WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 8
